Source code for app.models

import spacy



[docs]def spacy_similaity(STUDENT_ANSWER, CORRECT_ANSWER):
    """ Check similarity with Spacy function"""
    nlp = spacy.load('en_core_web_sm')
    doc1 = nlp(STUDENT_ANSWER)
    doc2 = nlp(CORRECT_ANSWER)

    return doc2.similarity(doc1)
